attributes.action: Stop the new junior doctors' contracts, it is not safe for patients care!
attributes.additional_details: The new contracts imposed unilaterally will certainly anger junior doctors and BMA, the junior doctors will certainly feel that their work is not being valued and their voice not  being heard and feel that a minister who has very little medical knowledge forces changes that are unfair but most importantly unsafe. There will be new strikes ahead and this will cause major disruption to patient care, this is not FAIR to patients and hard working junior doctors who are feel they are let down!!!.
attributes.background: The new contracts imposed unilaterally will certainly anger junior doctors and BMA, this will result in new strikes that can be very dangerous to patients. Please stop this going ahead.
